verbs.description: Samantha Bee [V: was] forced to apologize for her disgusting attack on Ivanka Trump today , but this is n’t the first time she ’s had to apologize for an offensive or stupid remark . There was that time , in 2017 , when she attacked a CPAC attendee for having “ Nazi hair . ” Bee later apologized to the attendee , Kyle Coddington , because it turned out he had stage 4 brain cancer .
